title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 01 April 2017 - XWiki
content:

06:53 <sgc072> Hi vmassol , could you please suggest some specific issues that I can start with.

10:08 <vmassol> sgc072: I alreayd have you a list of all issus tagged trivial or easy. Couldn't you pick some that corrspond to your skills and wish in there?

11:59 <vmassol> this is not a built in feature but there are some extensions. Don't know how well they work though  
11:59 <vmassol> for example http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/UIN%20Script%20Service

Should I mention the title of the project ( that I am interested in)  at the top heading or should follow the format given at    http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/student%20application%20form
